abstract: Wall Street has been contemplating a successor to Charles O. Prince III almost since he took over as Citigroup‘s chief executive four years ago. Now the job is actually open.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street has been contemplating a successor to Charles O. Prince III almost since he took over as Citigroup‘s chief executive four years ago. Now the job is actually open.

headline.main: Next Chief at Citigroup Likely to Be an Outsider
